main event: A round white object about the size of a basketball was observed on the radar screen for about 3 minutes.
interesting points: The object's speed and altitude could not be determined accurately.
The duration of the sighting, 3 minutes, is very long for a meteor observation.
The report mentions a possible satellite sighting by a Pan American flight in the same general area.
The Pan American flight observed a large ball with a white tail, similar to a comet, traveling from west to east.
The report notes that additional data is needed for a proper evaluation of the sighting.
sighted object: round white object about the size of a basketball
